scenes.description: A full moon illuminates an empty two-lane road with a RADIO TENT glowing under floodlights at the asphalt's edge.
The tent’s entrance flap gently flaps in a chill breeze.
Rows of vintage radio gear hum. ELA, in rugged field gear, sits behind a console with headphones on. A single lantern casts shadows.

dialogues.line: Got it. Stay calm. I’ll send help.

scenes.description: A battered PERSONAL SPACECRAFT lies buried in sand and rock. Sparks flicker from the torn hull. MARCUS struggles to clear debris.
Red warning lights blink. Marcus manually reboots communications by bridging a circuit.

dialogues.line: Life support at twenty-three percent. Engine integrity critical. Radio beacon offline.

scenes.description: Ela listens intently and receives Marcus's coordinates. She contacts Sheriff Miller.
Sheriff Miller wakes up, responding to Ela's call about the downed pilot.

dialogues.line: We’ve got a downed pilot, 10 klicks east. Bad shape. Need search party now.
Copy that. I’m on my way.

scenes.description: A sheriff's SUV travels down a dirt road, headlights cutting through the darkness.
Sheriff Miller checks the map against Marcus's coordinates.
The sheriff arrives at the crash. Marcus acknowledges his arrival; Ela follows with a first-aid kit.

dialogues.line: Stay still. Medics are en route.
We’ll get you out of here.

scenes.description: Sunrise filters in. Ela sits alone, looking at a photo of Marcus. Sheriff Miller joins her with coffee.

dialogues.line: He made it through the night.
Power levels nominal. Ready for extraction?

parsed_data.formatted_text:
================================================================================

SCENE 1
EXT. DESERTED HIGHWAY - NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
A full moon illuminates an empty two-lane road with a RADIO TENT glowing under floodlights at the asphalt's edge.


Transitions: FADE IN

================================================================================

SCENE 2
EXT. TENT’S ENTRANCE - NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
The tent’s entrance flap gently flaps in a chill breeze.


================================================================================

SCENE 3
INT. RADIO TENT - CONTINUOUS
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
Rows of vintage radio gear hum. ELA, in rugged field gear, sits behind a console with headphones on. A single lantern casts shadows.


Dialogue:
ELA (into mic)
    "Command, do you copy? Over."

MARCUS (V.O.) (faint, urgent)
    "…help…engine failure…coordinates… Desolation Road…"

ELA (softly)
    "Got it. Stay calm. I’ll send help."


Transitions: CUT TO

================================================================================

SCENE 4
EXT. ROCKY OUTCROP - EARLIER THAT NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
A battered PERSONAL SPACECRAFT lies buried in sand and rock. Sparks flicker from the torn hull. MARCUS struggles to clear debris.


Dialogue:
MARCUS (groans)
    "Computer, status report."


Transitions: CUT BACK TO

================================================================================

SCENE 5
INT. COCKPIT - CONTINUOUS
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
Red warning lights blink. Marcus manually reboots communications by bridging a circuit.


Dialogue:
AI VOICE (O.S.)
    "Life support at twenty-three percent. Engine integrity critical. Radio beacon offline."

MARCUS (breathless)
    "Then manually reboot comms. Now."

AI VOICE (O.S.)
    "Reestablishing signal."


Transitions: CUT BACK TO

================================================================================

SCENE 6
INT. RADIO TENT - NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
Ela listens intently and receives Marcus's coordinates. She contacts Sheriff Miller.


Dialogue:
MARCUS (V.O.)
    "Coordinates are 36.114, –115.172. Hurry. Over."

ELA
    "Sheriff Miller! You awake?"


================================================================================

SCENE 7
INT. SHERIFF’S OFFICE - NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
Sheriff Miller wakes up, responding to Ela's call about the downed pilot.


Dialogue:
SHERIFF MILLER (into radio)
    "Ela? What is it now?"

ELA (V.O.)
    "We’ve got a downed pilot, 10 klicks east. Bad shape. Need search party now."

SHERIFF MILLER
    "Copy that. I’m on my way."


Transitions: DISSOLVE TO

================================================================================

SCENE 8
EXT. DESOLATION ROAD - LATE NIGHT
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
A sheriff's SUV travels down a dirt road, headlights cutting through the darkness.


================================================================================

SCENE 9
INT. SHERIFF’S SUV - MOVING
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
Sheriff Miller checks the map against Marcus's coordinates.


Dialogue:
SHERIFF MILLER (muttering to himself)
    "36.114, –115.172… gotta be close."


================================================================================

SCENE 10
EXT. CRASH SITE - MOMENTS LATER
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
The sheriff arrives at the crash. Marcus acknowledges his arrival; Ela follows with a first-aid kit.


Dialogue:
MARCUS (weak, coughing)
    "You… you made it."

SHERIFF MILLER
    "Stay still. Medics are en route."

MARCUS
    "Thank you… Ela."

ELA
    "We’ll get you out of here."


Transitions: CUT TO

================================================================================

SCENE 11
INT. RADIO TENT - DAWN
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
Sunrise filters in. Ela sits alone, looking at a photo of Marcus. Sheriff Miller joins her with coffee.


Dialogue:
SHERIFF MILLER
    "He made it through the night."

ELA
    "Thanks to you all."

AI VOICE (calm, hopeful)
    "Power levels nominal. Ready for extraction?"

ELA (into mic, excited)
    "Affirmative. Let’s bring him home."


Transitions: FADE OUT
